abstract: Herman Van Rompuy, president of the European Union, delays the planned summit meeting to give leaders more time to complete a plan to fight a worsening debt crisis.
snippet: The president of the European Union delayed the planned summit meeting until Oct. 23 to give leaders more time to complete a plan to fight a worsening debt crisis.
lead_paragraph: The president of the European Union delayed the planned summit meeting until Oct. 23 to give leaders more time to complete a plan to fight a worsening debt crisis.

headline.main: Europe Delays Meeting on Debt Crisis Actions
headline.print_headline: Europe Delays Meeting On Debt Crisis Actions
headline.seo: Summit Meeting on Euro Debt Crisis Is Delayed
